title: New York
description: Travel activity book for children 6 to 12 years old, on New York City! Find your way through the Central Park Maze. Unscramble the Manhattan neighbourhoods. Color a Native American pattern. Solve the financial district word puzzle. Make up an ad for Times Square. And so much more. 28 pages of games, educational puzzles and fun, for children 6 to 12 years. Brightly illustrated pages brimming with activities to explore culture and customs, some history, sites of interest, food, language, and much more. As a bonus, crack a secret code to print the seal and stick it on to your very own Globetrotter Certificate! Other cities available Paris, Bangkok, Tokyo, Quebec & Montreal //www.myglobetrotterbook.com
author: Marisha Wojciechowska
